professional_summary: Expertise in SQL Server administration, database design, ETL processes, and BI tools. Seeking to leverage technical skills for data-driven solutions.

key_responsibilities: Administered and optimized SQL Server databases for high-performance applications.
Designed and implemented ETL processes using SSIS and DTS tools.
Developed T-SQL scripts for complex queries and stored procedures.
Collaborated with development teams to optimize SQL queries and stored procedures.
Implemented snapshot replication for data synchronization.

SQL Server Administration",
